[event]
# dorm room chest
type=on_trigger
location=3,36,1,1
hotspot=location
loot=currency,4,36,fixed,10,30
mapmod=object,3,36,160
repeat=false
soundfx=soundfx/wood_open.ogg
tooltip=Treasure Chest

[event]
# dorm room barrel
type=on_trigger
location=1,32,1,1
hotspot=location
loot=currency,2,32,fixed,10,20
mapmod=object,1,32,162
repeat=false
soundfx=soundfx/wood_open.ogg
tooltip=Barrel

[event]
# dorm room book
type=on_trigger
location=2,28,1,1
hotspot=location
loot=9000,2,29,fixed,1
mapmod=object,2,28,165
msg=This book bears the seal of the Averguard
repeat=false
requires_not_status=ak_tome_found
requires_status=ak_tome_search
soundfx=soundfx/inventory/inventory_page.ogg
tooltip=Book Stand

# overlook book 1

location=38,51,1,1

mapmod=object,38,51,164
msg="In the Age of Settlement, the Averguard Knights defended peasants against the chaos of the wilderness."
repeat=false

tooltip=Book Stand

[event]

location=38,46,1,1

repeat=false
soundfx=soundfx/inventory/inventory_page.ogg
tooltip=Book Stand
